name: Lazy Load
description: Object that doesn't contain all data you need but knows how to get it
when_to_use:
Performance optimization
Large datasets
On-demand loading
benefits:
Performance optimization
Memory efficiency
On-demand loading
drawbacks:
Complex implementation
N+1 query problem
Delayed loading
use_cases:
Large object graphs
Related data
Performance optimization
